text: Adds a spot light to the scene. A spot light casts light from a point in space, in a certain direction. The beam of light is cone shaped, with a radius and falloff at the edges.

summary: Adds a spot light to the scene. A spot light casts light from a point in space, in a certain direction. The beam of light is cone shaped, with a radius and falloff at the edges.
title: Spot Light
